River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. There are some breathtaking battle scenes and the Wanganui scenery is beautiful, but the crowning descision made by director Vincent Ward is the complete lack of subtitles for the Maori dialect even when non-Maori characters are speaking to each other.
This film would make an excellent History Channel special, but Ward's apparent goal was to make a more traditional romantic "drama." There

The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with feeding tubes going all over the place and several skeletons and bodies half eaten. So what are they now involved with????
